creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: lacquered writing box with heavily decorated cover and sides; zigzag down center divides pine tree with plum blossoms against a black background, from motif of chrysanthemums and leaves against reddish background; motifs continue on sides; ink stone and two empty boxes inside
medium: Black lacquer with gold maki-e, pearskin ground (nashiji), and pictorial pearskin ground (e-nashiji)
title: Writing box with pines, plum, chrysanthemums, and paulownia
